author: cnbc.com
title: Atrion Corporation Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
text:
ALLEN, Texas, Feb. 27, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Atrion Corporation (NASDAQ:ATRI) today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of $1.20 per share on its outstanding shares of Common Stock. This dividend will be payable on March 30, 2018 to stockholders of record at the close of business on March 15, 2018.
Atrion Corporation develops and manufactures products primarily for medical applications. The Companyâ€™s website is www.atrioncorp.com .
Contact: Jeffery Strickland Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (972) 390-9800
Source:Atrion Corporation
